originalText.text: I had a wonderful experience working with Harnham. Specifically, Jaashir Morris was amazing to work with. He was responsive and made a typically stressful process easy for me. He made sure to put my wants and needs first and helped me land a great position! Highly recommend!

text.text: I had a wonderful experience working with Harnham. Specifically, Jaashir Morris was amazing to work with. He was responsive and made a typically stressful process easy for me. He made sure to put my wants and needs first and helped me land a great position! Highly recommend!

originalText.text: Samuel Agre is an exceptional recruiter whom I had the pleasure of working with. I was impressed by his ability to understand my skills and interests to connect me with multiple job opportunities. He provided me with valuable insights and guidance throughout the entire interview process, and his suggestions were always transparent and well-informed. I appreciate his dedication to ensuring that I was well-prepared and informed about each position, which made the job search process much easier for me. I would highly recommend Sam to anyone looking for a recruiter who is honest, supportive, and effective. I am grateful for his assistance and am looking forward to collaborating with him in the future.

originalText.text: It's been a pleasure working with Harnham. My recruiter, Tyler Rawlings, was very approachable and involved, he seemed to care a lot about the outcome of my recruiting process. He was always quick to respond to any of my questions and even after the placement continued to check in every now and then to make sure my experience with the client is great. Wish more companies demonstrate such level of care and commitment. Thank you, Harnham and Tyler.

text.text: It's been a pleasure working with Harnham. My recruiter, Tyler Rawlings, was very approachable and involved, he seemed to care a lot about the outcome of my recruiting process. He was always quick to respond to any of my questions and even after the placement continued to check in every now and then to make sure my experience with the client is great. Wish more companies demonstrate such level of care and commitment. Thank you, Harnham and Tyler.

originalText.text:
I enjoyed my collaboration with Richard Rivera.
He was extremely accommodating throughout the whole process. Moreover, he has been very supportive even after I got a job. So resourceful!
I will always recommend Richard and Harnham to my data colleagues. They (the colleagues, Richard, and Harnham) are amazing!
If (God forbid) I would have to look for a new job in the future - I would always go to Richard for help.

originalText.text: As a candidate searching for jobs, it can be tough and a lot of recruiters ghost or don’t communicate. I worked with George Little over the course of a couple of months and he was always super responsive and friendly.  Even when the outcome wasn’t ideal, George was there to give me feedback and encourage me to get back up and try again. I would highly recommend working with Harnham!
